document:
<sentence id="s1" text="Objective:To investigate the expression and significance of CTHRC1 in patients with papillary thyroid cancinoma.Method:We collected 63 specimens of papillary thyroid carcinoma tissue with 36 specimens of the adjacent normal thyroid tissue and 23 specimens of thyroid nodular goiter.">
<sentence id="s2" text="The correlations between the expressions of CTHRC1 with clinicopathologic features,E-cadherin and Vimentin expression were analyzed.Result:CTHRC1 protein expression levels in papillary thyroid carcinoma tissue were significantly higher than those in adjacent normal thyroid tissue and benign disease(li>PAAAA0.01);CTHRC1 expression was significantly correlated with lymph node metastases(li>PAAAA0.05).">
